name: pwexg

stmt.origin: vtoclg(hs0, c0, c1, wcel(cpw(c0), universe), wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), universe))
stmt.pretty: vtoclg(hs0, c0, c1, P(c0)∈ 𝕌, P(hs0)∈ 𝕌)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cpw(c0), universe))
-| wi(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), universe), wcel(cpw(c0), universe)))
-| wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), universe)
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsw(hs0, wcel(cpw(c0), universe))

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cpw(c0), universe))
-| wi(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), universe), wcel(cpw(c0), universe)))
-| wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), universe)
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsw(hs0, wcel(cpw(c0), universe))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), universe), wcel(cpw(c0), universe)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cpw(cv(hs0)), cpw(c0)))

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cpw(c0), universe))
-| wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), universe)
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsw(hs0, wcel(cpw(c0), universe))
-| wi(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cpw(cv(hs0)), cpw(c0)))

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cpw(c0), universe))
-| wcel(cpw(cv(hs0)), universe)
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsw(hs0, wcel(cpw(c0), universe))

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cpw(c0), universe))
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsw(hs0, wcel(cpw(c0), universe))

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cpw(c0), universe))
-| diffsw(hs0, wcel(cpw(c0), universe))

comment: Power set axiom expressed in class notation, with the sethood requirement as an antecedent. (Contributed by NM, 30-Oct-2003.)
